name: Chompymon
description:
Made in 7ish hours by @foolmoron for Ludum Dare 43.

Grow a collection of cute demons who love to eat old files from your hard drive! The files that you feed to the Chompymon ARE ACTUALLY DELETED FOREVER. There are plenty of warnings about this. 

BIRTH/SUMMON your Chompymon, procedurally generated from your specific computer data

FEED files to the Chompymon to fatten it up, the bigger and older, the better

EVOLVE  your Chompymon by giving it a specific type of file of a certain size, to exponentially  boost your feeding ability

SOURCE CODE : https://github.com/foolmoron/Chompymon
